tableGroups.title: DataTable Pagination Props
tableGroups.description: Global pagination controls available on the DataTable component.

items.name: enablePagination
items.description: Enable pagination controls. Disable when using virtualization or infinite loading.

items.name: paginationMode
items.description: Switch between client-side or server-side pagination.

items.name: totalRow
items.description: Total rows available (required in server mode to calculate total pages).

items.name: onPaginationChange
items.description: Callback invoked whenever page index or page size changes.

items.name: initialState.pagination
items.description: Initial page index and page size when the table mounts.

slotPropGroups.title: Pagination SlotProps
slotPropGroups.description: Fine-tune the default pagination component via slotProps.pagination.

items.name: rowsPerPageOptions
items.description: Available page size options shown in the rows-per-page selector.

items.name: labelRowsPerPage
items.description: Custom label for the rows-per-page selector.

items.name: labelDisplayedRows
items.description: Formatter for the displayed rows summary (e.g. '1â€“10 of 100').

items.name: showFirstButton
items.description: Show a button to jump to the first page.

items.name: showLastButton
items.description: Show a button to jump to the last page.

items.name: sx
items.description: Override styles on the pagination component using MUI's sx prop.
